5.eng-name: The Book on the Two Eids
5.ara-name: أَبْوَابُ الْعِيدَيْنِ عَنْ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ

hadiths.text: Ali bin Abi Talib narrated:"It is from the SUnnah to leave for the Eid walking, and to eat something before leaving

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَشْىِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About Walking On The Day Of Eid

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"Allah's Messenger, Abu Bakr, and Umar would pray during the two Eid before the Khutbah, then they would give the Khutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ قَبْلَ الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About The Eid Prayers Before The Khutbah

hadiths.text: Jabir bin Samurah narrated:"I prayed the two Eid prayers with the Prophet - not one time, not two times - without and Adhan nor an Iqamah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ صَلاَةَ الْعِيدَيْنِ بِغَيْرِ أَذَانٍ وَلاَ إِقَامَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About The Salat For The Two Eid Is Without An Adhan Nor An Iqamah

hadiths.text: An-Numan bin Bashir narrated:"For the two Eid and the Friday prayer, the Prophet would recite: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High, and Has there come to you the narration of the overwhelming? And sometimes they would occur on he same day, so he would recite the two of them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related About About] The Recitation During The Two Eid

hadiths.text: Ubaidullah bin Abdullah bin Utbah narrated:"Umar bin Al-Khattab asked Abu Waqid Al-Laithi what Allah's Messenger would recite during Al-Fitr and Al-Adha, so he said: 'He would recite: Qaf, By the Glorious Quran and the Hour has drawn near, and the moon has been cleft asunder

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related About About] The Recitation During The Two Eid

hadiths.text: Ubaidullah bin Abdullah bin Utbah:There is a another chain with similar narration

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related About About] The Recitation During The Two Eid

hadiths.text: Kathir bin Abdullah narrated from this father, from his grandfather:"The Prophet said the Takbir in the first (Rak'ah) sever (times) before the recitation, and in the last, five (times) before the recitation

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّكْبِيرِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About The Takbir On The Two Eid

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"The Prophet went out on the day of Al-Fitr, so he prayed two Rak'ah, then he did not pray before it nor after it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ لاَ صَلاَةَ قَبْلَ الْعِيدِ وَلاَ بَعْدَهَا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About 'There Is No Salat Before The Two Eid And No Salat After Them'

hadiths.text: Abu Bakr bin Hafs - and he is Ibn Umar bin Sa'd bin Abi Waqas - narrated about Ibn Umar, that:"He went out on the day of Eid, and he did not pray before it nor after it. He mentioned that the Prophet did so

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ لاَ صَلاَةَ قَبْلَ الْعِيدِ وَلاَ بَعْدَهَا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About 'There Is No Salat Before The Two Eid And No Salat After Them'

hadiths.text: Umm Atiyyah narrated:"Allah's Messenger would order the virgins, the mature women, the secluded and the menstruating to go out for the two Eid. As for the menstruating women, they were to stay away from the Musalla and participate in the Muslims supplications." One of them said: 'O Messenger of Allah! What if she does not have a Jilbab? He said: 'Then let her sis lend her a Jilbab

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي خُرُوجِ النِّسَاءِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: About The Women Going Out For The Two Eid

hadiths.text: There is a similar narration from Umm Atiyyah :with another chain

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي خُرُوجِ النِّسَاءِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: About The Women Going Out For The Two Eid

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated:"When Allah's Messenger would go out on the day of Eid by one route, he would return by another

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي خُرُوجِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم إِلَى الْعِيدِ فِي طَرِيقٍ وَرُجُوعِهِ مِنْ طَرِيقٍ آخَرَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About the Prophet (ﷺ) Going To The Eid By One Route, And Returning By Another

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Buraidah narrated from his father:"The Prophet would not leave on the Day of Fitr until he ate, and he would not eat on the day of Adha until he prayed

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الأَكْلِ يَوْمَ الْفِطْرِ قَبْلَ الْخُرُوجِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About Eating On The Day Of Fitr Before Going Out

hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik narrated:"The Prophet would have a breakfast of dates on the Day of Fitr before leaving for the Musalla

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الأَكْلِ يَوْمَ الْفِطْرِ قَبْلَ الْخُرُوجِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About Eating On The Day Of Fitr Before Going Out
